email.subject: Google Ads Report - {{title}}
email.intro: I'm sharing the following Google Ads analysis report with you...
email.passwordProtected: This report is password protected (password not available - please share separately)
email.questions: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

empty.title: Start your report
empty.description: Drag slides from the library or click to add

performance_overview.title: Performance Overview
performance_overview.description: Key metrics: impressions, clicks, cost, conversions

key_metrics.title: Key Metrics
key_metrics.description: Spend, Revenue, ROAS and CPA with variations

ad_creative.title: Ad Preview
ad_creative.description: Google Ads mockup with performance data

security.title: Report Security
security.description: Protect your report with a password
security.enabledDescription: Visitors will need to enter a password to access the report
security.disabledDescription: The report is publicly accessible without a password
security.passwordHelp: This password will be required for visitors to access the report. Share it securely.
security.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
security.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

deleteConfirm.title: Delete report
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete the report "{{title}}"?

error.title: Loading error
error.noData: No data available for this period

AUTHENTICATION_ERROR.message: Your Google Ads connection has expired.

PERMISSION_ERROR.message: You don't have permission to access this account.
PERMISSION_ERROR.suggestion: Check your access rights to the Google Ads account.

RATE_LIMIT_ERROR.suggestion: Please wait a moment and try again.

TIMEOUT_ERROR.suggestion: Please try again. If the problem persists, try a shorter date range.

NETWORK_ERROR.suggestion: Check your internet connection and try again.

NO_DATA.message: No data available for this period.
NO_DATA.suggestion: Try selecting a different date range.

INVALID_PERIOD.message: The selected date range is invalid.

ACCOUNT_NOT_FOUND.suggestion: Verify that the account is properly linked to Flipika.

UNKNOWN_ERROR.suggestion: Please try again. If the problem persists, contact support.

emptyState.title: No data available
emptyState.message: This report doesn't contain any slides. Add slides to visualize your Google Ads data.
emptyState.suggestion: Return to the editor to add slides to your report.

errorBoundary.title: An error occurred
errorBoundary.message: An unexpected problem occurred. Please try again or go back to home.

reassurance.title: Everything is ready!
reassurance.description: The report is ready. Click above to generate it as a PDF and prepare the email for your client.

postSend.title: PDF document downloaded & email app opened
postSend.description: Your PDF report has already been downloaded. Your native email application should have opened with a prepared message.

troubleshoot.title: Email didn't open?
troubleshoot.description: If your email application didn't launch automatically, here's how to fix it:

desktop.title: On desktop
desktop.mac: macOS: Mail > Settings > General > Default email reader.
desktop.windows: Windows: Settings > Apps > Default apps > Email.

mobile.title: On mobile
mobile.ios: iOS: Settings > [Mail App] > Default Mail App.
mobile.android: Android: Settings > Apps > Choose default apps > Email app.

step1.title: Get the PDF
step1.description: The PDF file has been automatically downloaded to your device.

step2.title: Drag and drop
step2.description: Drag the downloaded file into your email window.

step3.title: Send it!
step3.description: Review one last time and click send.

info.modalContent:
Reports are customizable Google Ads performance documents that you create and share with your accounts or stakeholders.

With reports, you can:
• Combine multiple slide types (metrics, charts, text, creatives) into comprehensive presentations
• Analyze specific campaigns and date ranges
• Save as drafts, publish, or archive for organization
• Password-protect reports for secure sharing
• Generate PDF exports for offline distribution
• Share via email with pre-filled content

Reports can be created from scratch or generated from templates for faster, consistent deliverables.
